version_description:
As requested by you, we have added ability to delete recent searches. 

We're always trying to improve your experience. If you like our app, please consider taking a few moments to rate our app.

As requested by you, we have added ability to delete recent searches. 

We're always trying to improve your experience. If you like our app, please consider taking a few moments to rate our app.

We have a great update for you! You should upgrade to this version ASAP, but if you are thinking, here are top features and updates you should look out for -

1. 3D touch support on recent searches to preview, reveal, share or delete.
2. All new widget for your lock screen to quickly open your previous searches.
3. You can now initiate a new search, share the app or open a recent search directly from app icon.
4. A help icon on top-right of home screen to .... click it to find out.

Our developers can't catch a breath. They worked for several nights to ease OTP flow for you. 

Car Info has reached 1 million downloads with over 10 million vehicle searches and counting. Thanks for your love and support.

Further tweaks to make you manage your Garage even easier.

Car Info has reached 1 million downloads with over 10 million vehicle searches and counting. Thanks for your love and support.

Car Info has reached 1 million + downloads with over 10 million vehicle searches and counting. Thanks for your love and support.

In this update
- Faster response time
- Updated databases

Car Info has reached 1 million + downloads with over 10 million vehicle searches and counting. Thanks for your love and support.

In this update
- Faster response time
- Updated databases

Sometimes, little things matter the most. Sometimes, little moments can last forever. And sometimes, just sometimes, little applications can help you in big way. We want to be that application. We are always trying hard to make your experience better. Any feedback and suggestion would be really appreciated.

Sincerely,
Team Cuvora
Some under the hood improvements for making your experience better.
Now search cars by owner name!
As we told you all in the previous update, this release fixes all the bugs we introduced in this version :)
Bug fixes.
Experience faster search and fewer glitches with this update.
Another update to keep things, and hopefully you, moving along nicely.
Added support for iPhone X. Better late than never.
Introducing all new garage.
Fixed a bug where app was not started for some users.
We have been trying hard to fix a persistent issue occurring to small set of our users. Please contact us on cuvora@gmail.com for your feedback and suggestions.
Boring Update with bug fixes & stability improvements.
Your garage is getting a full revamp.
Killed little nasty bugs and fixed all the glitches affecting iOS 12!

We always strive to give you the best possible experience possible on Car Info. This updates adds support for the latest XS and XS Max. Do let us you if you have any feedback or suggestions using the feedback menu in the app :)
Fixed what needed fixing and squished some bugs.
This release was dedicated, mainly towards adding a little bit of polish and shine to our existing features!
We may not have broken a sweat this session, but we’ve been maintaining a steady pace to keep things ticking over nicely for you.
There's no place like home. It's the only place where everyone can stay safe. Avoid leaving the house and avoid contact with people outside your household. Also, avoid bugs by updating CarInfo.
We have added insurance, pollution and finance information to the vehicle details!
Dear humans, we have killed all the bugs and made the app faster, stronger, and better. Keeping up with the car and auto industry news is now more fun!

If there is one thing the pandemic has taught us, it’s not taking things for granted. 
Remember to always care & always be prepared. We’ll overcome this together :)

If there is one thing the pandemic has taught us, it’s not taking things for granted. 
Remember to always care & always be prepared. We’ll overcome this together :)
Few under the hood changes to make your experience better than ever before!!
Few under the hood changes to make your experience better than ever before!
Our developers and product managers are calling it a completely upgraded version of owner detail, but we know you will only remember it for saving you time. Lots and lots of it.
